title: Ticket #1993: Vanilla Universe job sat in status 'X' (removed) for hours
description:
I tried to remove a job, but it sitting in the queue forever!

And there is not trace in the logs I tried to remove it!

Am I doing something wrong?

Igor

[igorschedd@cmssrv96 simple]$ condor_q 85548.0


-- Submitter: cmssrv96.fnal.gov : <131.225.206.93:9999?sock=40180_7d7b_2> : cmssrv96.fnal.gov
 ID      OWNER            SUBMITTED     RUN_TIME ST PRI SIZE CMD
85548.0   igorschedd      3/22 14:14   0+00:00:00 X  0   0.0  lt_job.sh 0.525 jo
[igorschedd@cmssrv96 simple]$ grep 85548 ~/glidecondor/condor_local/log/ShadowLog
03/22/11 14:53:14 Initializing a VANILLA shadow for job 85548.0
03/22/11 14:53:14 (85548.0) (42923): Request to run on glidein_17601@cmswn963.fnal.gov <131.225.189.22:58657?CCBID=131.225.206.102:7836#573&noUDP> was ACCEPTED
03/22/11 14:53:16 (85548.0) (42923): Can't open directory "/home/igorschedd/glidecondor/condor_local/spool/5548/0/cluster85548.proc0.subproc0.tmp" as PRIV_USER, errno: 2 (No such file or directory)
03/22/11 14:53:16 (85548.0) (42923): Can't open directory "/home/igorschedd/glidecondor/condor_local/spool/5548/0/cluster85548.proc0.subproc0" as PRIV_USER, errno: 2 (No such file or directory)
[igorschedd@cmssrv96 simple]$ grep 85548 ~/glidecondor/condor_local/log/SchedLog
03/22/11 14:53:14 (pid:40183) Starting add_shadow_birthdate(85548.0)
03/22/11 14:53:14 (pid:40183) Started shadow for job 85548.0 on glidein_17601@cmswn963.fnal.gov <131.225.189.22:58657?CCBID=131.225.206.102:7836#573&noUDP> for igorschedd, (shadow pid = 42923)

The job finally terminated...

[igorschedd@cmssrv96 simple]$ grep 85548 ~/glidecondor/condor_local/log/SchedLog
03/22/11 14:53:14 (pid:40183) Starting add_shadow_birthdate(85548.0)
03/22/11 14:53:14 (pid:40183) Started shadow for job 85548.0 on glidein_17601@cmswn963.fnal.gov <131.225.189.22:58657?CCBID=131.225.206.102:7836#573&noUDP> for igorschedd, (shadow pid = 42923)
03/22/11 16:55:33 (pid:40183) Shadow pid 42923 for job 85548.0 exited with status 102

(unfortunately the shadowlog rolled over when I checked)

[igorschedd@cmssrv96 2011-03-22_14.13.44]$ grep 85548 job.log
000 (85548.000.000) 03/22 14:14:54 Job submitted from host: <131.225.206.93:9999?sock=40180_7d7b_2>
001 (85548.000.000) 03/22 14:53:16 Job executing on host: <131.225.189.22:58657?CCBID=131.225.206.102:7836#573&noUDP>
006 (85548.000.000) 03/22 14:58:26 Image size of job updated: 14616
011 (85548.000.000) 03/22 15:03:27 Job was unsuspended.
004 (85548.000.000) 03/22 16:55:32 Job was evicted.
009 (85548.000.000) 03/22 16:55:33 Job was aborted by the user.
016 (85548.000.000) 03/22 16:55:33 POST Script terminated.


But something went awfully wrong.
remarks:
2011-Mar-23 11:44:19 by tannenba:
Shame shadow log rotated :(.

Dan will do some investigation today and sound the alarm later this afternoon if he is stuck.

2011-Mar-23 16:29:32 by danb:
It turns out that the version of glideinWMS being used in this test is enabling glexec in the old way: 

GLEXEC_JOB = false
GLEXEC_STARTER = true

This may explain the strange behavior of condor_rm. We will test the behavior after the glexec configuration is fixed.

2011-Mar-23 17:16:03 by danb:
Confirmed. condor_rm works promptly when glexec is used in the recommended way (GLEXEC_JOB=true).
creator: tannenba
